messages.title: Real change for Britain
messages.content: This election is in your hands. Don't let the old parties scare you with their negative attacks. Don't let the old parties tell you that things can't be different. They can be. With your support on Thursday, Britain can have real change with the Liberal Democrats. Together we can give our country the fresh start it needs.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: We will create jobs investing in renewable energy, public transport and housing. We will take tough action on the banks to get lending to businesses.
We will give people the power to sack MPs who are found to be corrupt. We will ban big political donations. We will change our crazy electoral system.
We will make taxes fairer so that no one will pay tax on the first £10,000 they earn - saving most tax payers £700. We will make the very well off pay their fair share.
We will use savings from NHS admin to protect frontline services. We will invest in our schools to cut class sizes. We will put 3000 more police on patrol to catch more criminals.
We will keep Britain's deterrent, but won't waste £100billion on a system we don't need. We will make sure our Armed Forces have the equipment they need and that we care for our veterans.
We will strengthen Britain's border controls. We will sort out the current immigration mess and ensure new immigrants go to places where they are needed.

issues.economy: We will create jobs investing in renewable energy, public transport and housing. We will take tough action on the banks to get lending to businesses.
issues.education: We will invest in our schools to cut class sizes.
issues.environment: We will create jobs investing in renewable energy.

housing.content: We will create jobs investing in... housing.

endorsements.endorsement: Liberal Democrats ahead of Labour in new poll
Nick Clegg now in contention as potential PM

images.caption: Candidates and supporters holding 'I'm voting for things to be different this time' sign.
